joke: Why did the rock band go to the bank? To get their quartz-erly earnings!
What do you call a rock that never goes to school? A skipping stone!
Why was the geologist always calm? He knew how to keep his cool under pressure.
Why did the pebble break up with the boulder? It found the relationship too rocky.
What do you call a rock that likes to sing? A rockstar!
Why was the rock always stressed? Because it was under a lot of pressure!
Why did the rock go to school? To become a little boulder.
Why did the limestone break up with the granite? It felt taken for granite.
How do rocks get to school? By rock and roll bus!
What do you call a rock who tells jokes? A stand-up schist.
Why did the rock go to the doctor? Because it had a hard problem!
Why are rocks so good at music? Because they have perfect quartz!
What’s a rock’s favorite fruit? A rockmelon.
What do you call a rock that never stops talking? A blabber-stone.
Why did the rock refuse to move? It didn’t want to be taken for granite.
What is a rock’s favorite type of music? Rock and roll!
Why do rocks make terrible pets? Because they’re always stoned.
What did the rock say to the geologist? Nothing, rocks don’t talk.
What do you get when you mix a rock with a joke? A rock pun!
Why did the rock sit in the middle of the road? Because it wanted to be a little boulder!
What kind of rocks are best at math? Geometrics!
What did the pebble wear to the beach? A rocky-tocky!
Why are mountains so funny? Because they are hill-areas!
What kind of rock is never late? A punctual quartz!
Why did the rock get in trouble? Because it took everything for granite.
What do you call a smart rock? A brightolite!
Why did the rock blush? Because it saw the earth’s core!
What did the rock do at the party? It rocked out!
How do rocks relax? They lay back and unwind!
What’s a rock’s favorite dessert? Rocky road ice cream!
Why did the rock go to jail? Because it was caught breaking and entering!
Why do rocks hate going to school? Because they always get stuck in geology class!
Why was the rock so good at basketball? Because it was on a roll!
What did the rock say to the soil? You’re dirt cheap!
What do you call a lazy rock? A couch pebble.
Why did the rock start a band? Because it wanted to rock and roll!
Why do rocks never get lost? Because they always stay grounded.
What’s a rock’s favorite vegetable? Rock-cauliflower!
Why did the rock become a lawyer? It wanted to practice law of the land.
What’s a rock’s favorite snack? Chips!
Why did the rock take a nap? Because it was stone tired.
What do you call a rock in the kitchen? A rolling stone!
Why was the rock bad at relationships? Because it was too hard-headed!
What do you call a rock that tells time? A clock-rock!
Why did the rock go to the party? Because it was ready to roll!
Why are rocks terrible liars? Because they can never cover up their cracks.
Why did the rock bring a ladder? To reach the high notes!
What’s a rock’s favorite candy? Pop rocks!
Why was the rock so cool? Because it was a rolling stone!
What’s a rock’s favorite toy? A rock-et!
Why did the rock stay home? It was grounded!
What’s a rock’s favorite movie? Rocky!
Why did the rock bring a flashlight? To shed some light on the situation!
What do you call a rock that’s really good at sports? A jock rock!
Why do rocks never go hungry? Because they’re always a little boulder.
What’s a rock’s favorite drink? Mineral water!
Why was the rock so successful? Because it never cracked under pressure!
What did the rock say to the sand? You rock my world!
Why did the rock get a job? Because it wanted to be a little boulder.
Why do rocks make great friends? Because they’re solid!
What’s a rock’s favorite school subject? Geography!
Why did the rock sit by the water? Because it wanted to feel a little wave.
Why did the rock bring an umbrella? In case of a meteor shower!
What did the rock say to the lava? You’re too hot to handle!
What’s a rock’s favorite flower? A stone-crop!
Why did the rock get promoted? Because it was on a roll!
Why do rocks love the beach? Because they can rock and sand!
What’s a rock’s favorite animal? A rock-lion!
Why did the rock join the choir? Because it had a rockin' voice!
Why did the rock go to college? To get a little boulder.
What did the rock say to the mountain? You’re my peak interest!
Why did the rock take a bath? Because it was feeling a little dirty.
Why did the rock become a chef? Because it loved to rock the kitchen!
What do you call a rock that’s always complaining? A whine-stone.
Why was the rock good at soccer? Because it knew how to roll with it!

Why did the rock go to the library? To improve its geology!
